title: Optimize blog layout for mobile
description: 1. Remove site subtitle on mobile. 2. Implement a single-line navigation bar with a hamburger menu on the left that expands to a dropdown. 3. Reduce post title size to match body text. 4. Make hero image 24px and place text to its right. 5. Optimize vertical space (1px gap between boxes, reduced internal padding).

title: Compact vertical whitespace on blog home page
description: The vertical whitespace on the blog home page is currently too large. It needs to be compacted to show more content above the fold. This includes adjusting margins/padding between post cards, header, and footer.
